response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which holds significant value for you at $12,000. I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. To make this opportunity accessible, I propose a price of $10,000 for the product. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a great value compared to its worth. I look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to ask.", "product_price": 10000}
